players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we don't let any mafia members slip through our grasp."
Diana: "I believe Bob's death was suspicious"
You: "I think we should all keep a close eye on Charlie tonight. His silence during the discussion round one raised some red flags for me."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafioso. His silence during the discussion round and his sudden accusation of me being suspicious are red flags."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
